attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nowadays it seems as if just because somebody is muslim it means they can break the law or act racist towards British people without any consequences just because the government are afraid of any consequences.

Stop fear, we all deserve to live either equally obeying the laws.

Or not together.

rejection.details: This is a statement of belief, with no reference to events that can be verified.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
